patthana8.61:4.1: Nasavitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.61:5.1: Naavitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.61:6.1: Nasavitakkañca naavitakkañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.61:7.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … purejāte āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
